item.description:
From the MFA website:

Another year, another crop of mouth-watering animated videos. Watch The Horrors come to a grisly end in Corin Hardy's triumphant video for their latest track, "She Is the New Thing"; The Chemistry Set helps Mark Ronson bring Radiohead's "Just" to a new audience; and an animated montage of London graf work, Wade Shotter's dice-tastic video for Fujiya Miyagi and Michel Gondry's White Stripes "Fell in Love With A Girl." Sit back and indulge yourself on these excellent treats.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be holding a meetup sign at the front of the theater after the film, so we can head off to a local cafe. I'm 5'3" and brunette.
item.why: The MFA's yearly Mirrorball series of music videos from the Edinburgh film festival is a blast, yet most people aren't aware of it. The music videos are like moving paintings and it's a real treat for the senses. See what you've been missing out on!
item.name: Visual Delights: Animated Music Videos at the MFA
